text: The inauguration ceremony of the exhibition will be held on 17th August at 3.00 p.m. under the patronage of President Maithripala Sirisena.This is open to the public from 18th August from 10 a.m. to 8.p.m.The photographic exhibition Heta Dakina Ranil (Ranil who sees the future) depicting the special moments of 40 years in politics of Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe will be held from 17th- 20th August at the BMICH. The inauguration ceremony of the exhibition will be held on 17th August at 3.00 p.m. under the patronage of President Maithripala Sirisena.This is open to the public from 18th August from 10 a.m. to 8.p.m.
title: Heta Dakina Ranil opens on August 17
